sources.name: Penn World Table 9.0
sources.description:
Penn World Table
Data provider University of Groningen
Source Penn World Table 9.0
Description Expenditure-side real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011US$
Linkhttp://www.rug.nl/research/ggdc/data/pwt/pwt-9.0
Retrieved1 August 2016

Additional information

Expenditure-side real GDP at chained PPPs, to compare relative living standards across countries and over time. It is the ratio of the 'rgdpe' and 'pop' series.

More detailed information about this dataset can be found in the source documentation at: http://www.rug.nl/research/ggdc/data/pwt/v90/what_is_new_in_pwt90.pdf

variables.name: Penn World Table 9.0 (Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011US$)
